name: Poppin Ballz - Ballz Blast
description:
Breakthrough Pinball game is now here!
Easy and refreshing play!

Pick up coins and buy skins!
4956 possible combinations
Let's customize and play with your favorite skin!

Basic Rule
Touch the screen and operate the flipper!
Bounce the ball against the block and destroy it!
If the block touches the game over line game is over ...

Pickup items to aim for high scores!
